Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory347.jpg'}
{3: 'The revived ingredients are soon dismantled, but the kitchen—which has been reduced to "scorched earth," literally—is not recovered.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina (?)', 3: 'You have some use after all. Now I have received enough offerings.', 4: '1'}
{2: "Who's that?", 3: '7', 4: 'Whose voice is that?', 5: '7'}
{2: 'Stove God', 3: "Hmph, it's me! The mighty Stove God!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Did you turn our kitchen into this?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lucia keeps her head down while still grasping the kitchen knife. You can see the steel handle is already deformed in her hand.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Stove God', 3: 'I... I did, but that was because you were too slow to make your offerings!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Stove God', 3: "Today's the day to worship the Kitchen God, don't you know?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Stove God', 3: "How am I going to return to the heaven without enough offerings? I can't even give you a score!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The Stove God probably has realized her mistake. She is still loud, but nowhere as arrogant as before.'}
{2: "But that doesn't mean you can just blow up our kitchen!", 3: '19'}
{3: 'You made a powerless complaint. Do you still have to pay the kitchen repair bills even in this space?'}
{2: 'Stove God', 3: "I made a mistake with the strength of the explosion. Without enough offering, I couldn't do a lot of things.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Stove God', 3: "Can't think properly when I'm hungry.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Stove God', 3: 'On the other hand, if I have receive enough offerings, then everything would be a piece of cake.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Stove God', 3: 'Just now, you have provided enough offerings. I can do anything now!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Can you restore the kitchen to what it once was?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Stove God', 3: 'Of course. Are you underestimating me?!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Stove God', 3: 'Totalus...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Stove God', 3: 'Ahem, not this one.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Stove God', 3: 'Blow it all up!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Not this one either!', 3: '35'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}
{3: 'Boom'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBaiBegin.prefab', 2: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory428.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBaiEnd.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBaiBegin.prefab'}
{3: 'Your vision is blocked by the blazing light and dust from the explosion.'}
{3: 'After you can finally see again, you realize the kitchen has been restored. On top of that—'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory423.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Stove God', 3: 'I can easily do this too. Take it as a bonus gift.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The messed up ingredients have turned into many delicious dishes, still steaming hot.'}
{3: 'Crack.'}
{3: 'Lucia has crushed the handle of her knife.'}
{3: 'Not being able to cook seems to have a more adverse impact on her than the damage to the kitchen.'}
{2: 'Stove God', 3: "I'm leaving. Do you have any other words for me?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Stove God', 3: "I-I didn't stay for that! Hmph!", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryGoldDust.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryGoldDust.prefab', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The Stove God turns into light and disappears in the stovetop.'}
{3: 'Lucia makes a sigh, apparently disappointed.'}
